description: Many metro Atlanta outposts of Chick-fil-A are giving away free Chick-n-Minis for breakfast, including Cobb locations in Marietta and Vinings
title: Hey, Cobb: Y’all know about that free Chick-fil-A today, right?
title_page: Hey, Cobb: Y’all know about that free Chick-fil-A today, right?
text:
Tuesdays are usually better than Mondays, but Chick-fil-A just pushed this Tuesday over the edge of greatness. Like, honestly, today should be embarrassed.
The chicken chain is offering a free three-count order of its Chick-n-Minis from opening to 10:30 a.m. at various metro Atlanta outposts, including a few in Cobb County.
The Vinings location at 2485 Cumberland Parkway SE will be participating, said Mark Burgh, the store’s general manager.
He said the event isn’t tied to anything in particular.
Burgh said he didn’t know exactly which stores were participating, so it might be best to call the eatery you have in mind before being disappointed.
But from the looks of their Facebook pages, the 2555 Dallas Highway SW location and 2105 Roswell Road store are in.
